Please allow the app to use your location!
 
The app doesn't give your GPS- information to any 3rd parties. Any GPS- data is only beeing used for the app's function of managing the sound profiles of your device based on your location.
 
Your locations are only beeing stored on your device and are gone when deleting this app.
Please allow the app to manage your sound profiles!\n \nAdjusting your sound profile is one of the core functions of this app.

Please allow the app to access your location and to manage your sound profile!
 
Your GPS- data and adjusting your sound profile are needed for the core features of the app to work.
You sadly can't use the app without granting these permissions!

GPS Silence collects location data to compare your added locations with your current location and to adjust the device\'s sound setting according to your in-app configuration, even when the app is closed or not in use.\n Only the lat/lng-coordinates of your device are beeing used within the app.\n This might affect your battery. That\'s why you can adjust the interval, in which the algorithm fires in the background, in the app\'s settings.
Your current settings will prohibit collecting location data in the background, while the device is in doze.\n\n You can put this app on whitelist, otherwise it won\'t work, while the app is in doze.
